title: CIP-119 Common
description: Metadata document for Cardano DReps, extending CIP-100

hashAlgorithm.title: Hash Algorithm
hashAlgorithm.description: The algorithm used to authenticate this document externally (CIP-100)

body.title: Body
body.description: The body of the metadata document (CIP-100)

paymentAddress.title: Payment Address
paymentAddress.description: A Cardano Bech32 encoded payment address.

objectives.title: Objectives
objectives.description: A short description of what the person believes and what they want to achieve as a DRep, maximum of 1000 characters.

motivations.title: Motivations
motivations.description: A short description of why they want to be a DRep, what personal and professional experiences have they had that have driven them to register, maximum 1000.

qualifications.title: Qualifications
qualifications.description: A space where the registrant can to list the qualifications they hold that are relevant to their role as a DRep, maximum 1000.

doNotList.title: Do Not List
doNotList.description: A true or false value means that the DRep does not want to show up in tooling that displays DReps.
